name: WorldDAB
goal:
WorldDAB is the global industry forum for digital radio, facilitating the adoption and implementation of broadcast digital radio based on DAB / DAB+, the digital radio standards of choice for broadcasters across Europe, Asia Pacific and other regions.

WorldDAB delivers tailored solutions and advice on all aspects of the switch from analogue to digital radio including regulation, licensing, technical trials, network build out, marketing and production of new digital radio content.
interests: Business and Industry, Culture and media, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Proposal for a Directive Establishing a European Electronic Communications Code
Radio Equipment Directive
